OMS.SortableTable.name: OMS.SortableTable

constructors.description:
Sortable table class that allows the user to order a table

Usage: var sTable = new OMS.SortableTable($('table')[0]);

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function which fires after sorting the table

sort.description: Sorts the table with the given column and sort order

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function which fires after sorting the table

_sortColumn.description: Sort the table using the returned values from _sortValues

_sortValues.description: Sort the values of the column

_headerEvents.description: Adds click events to the headers

OMS.SortableTable.description:
Sortable table class that allows the user to order a table

Usage: var sTable = new OMS.SortableTable($('table')[0]);

OMS.Tree.name: OMS.Tree

constructors.description:
A list with drag and drop functionalities

Usage: var dndTree = new OMS.Tree($('ul')[0]);

_moveElement.description: Move the current element and find the target element

_placeElement.description: Places the element on the position targeted

save.description: Call the ajax-doc to save the tree

_addEvents.description: Adds the events to the elements

undo.description: Reverts the last change done in the tree and removes it from the history;

_targetElement.description: The element that is being hovered when dragging.

_startX.description: The horizontal coordinate of the mouse relative to whole document on initialisation of the drag.

_startY.description: The vertical coordinate of the mouse relative to whole document on initialisation of the drag.

itemHeight.description: The (line-)height of a list item without children lists.

_listItems.description: jQuery reference to the list items in the _tree

alertTimeout.description: The time to wait until ajaxDoc is called.

_dragElement.description: The element that is being dragged.

_elemX.description: The horizontal coordinate of the dragging to _tree on initialisation of the drag.

_elemY.description: The vertical coordinate of the dragging to _tree on initialisation of the drag.

ajaxResultElement.description: The element where the ajax resultt is placed in.

history.description: Array which holds the tree's edit hisory

OMS.Tree.description:
A list with drag and drop functionalities

Usage: var dndTree = new OMS.Tree($('ul')[0]);

OMS.AutoComplete.name: OMS.AutoComplete

constructors.description:
An input field that can complete text while typing

Usage: var autoCompleteField = new OMS.InfiniteScroll($('input')[0]);

addEvents.description: Adds the keyup and blur event to the input for loading and showing the results

ajaxDoc.description: Document to call for the results

OMS.AutoComplete.description:
An input field that can complete text while typing

Usage: var autoCompleteField = new OMS.InfiniteScroll($('input')[0]);

OMS.InfiniteScroll.name: OMS.InfiniteScroll

constructors.description:
A table that has an infinite scroll

Usage: var infiniteScroll = new OMS.InfiniteScroll($('table')[0]);

addScrollEvents.description: Adds the scroll events to the window for loading new rows when the bottom is in view

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function which fires after adding the results in the DOM

loadRows.description: Loads the rows from the ajaxDoc and adds them to the tbody

removeScrollEvents.description: Removes the scroll events from the window

noMoreResults.description: Text to show when there are no more results

ajaxDoc.description: Document to get the new rows

maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows to get

OMS.InfiniteScroll.description:
A table that has an infinite scroll

Usage: var infiniteScroll = new OMS.InfiniteScroll($('table')[0]);

OMS.Tabs.name: OMS.Tabs

constructors.description:
A tabbed list with ajax calls.

Usage: var tabs = new OMS.Tabs($('ul')[0]);

_setClickEvents.description: Sets the click events to the list items

OMS.Tabs.description:
A tabbed list with ajax calls.

Usage: var tabs = new OMS.Tabs($('ul')[0]);
